```{r}
library(readr)
```

```{r}
zone_names <- read_csv('../lsms_data/ethiopia/et_local_area_unit_conversion.csv')
zone_names
```

```{r}
zone_names <- zone_names %>% mutate(zonename=tolower(zonename)) %>% select(region, zone, zonename)
unique(zone_names)
zone_names$zonename[zone_names$zonename=='south wolo'] <- 'south wollo'
sort(unique(zone_names$zonename))
```
